login_required: You must be logged in to access this page.
forgot_text: Please enter the email address used during your registration. You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
send_email_text: An email with instructions on how to reset your password has been sent to your email address. If you do not receive it within the next few minutes, please check that you have entered the email address associated with your account before trying again.
delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your profile
already_tournament: You are already in a tournament, finish it before starting a new one
id_not_found: No tournament found with this ID
tournament_full: You cannot join this tournament (already full)
qr_text: You will need a two-factor authentication app to complete this process. And scan this QR code with your app.
manual_code_text: Enter the 6-digit authentication code generated by your authentication app:
already_use_mail: This email is already in use.
already_use_login: This username is already in use.
cookies_text: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. By continuing, you agree to our cookie policy.
privacy_auth: By signing in or signing up, you agree to our Privacy Policy
read_accept: I have read and accept the terms of use.
privacy_msg: Thank you for using our website. We value the privacy of our users highly. This privacy policy outlines the information we collect and how we use it.
info_collected_msg: We automatically collect users' IP address and language for convenience and to improve the user experience. This information is used anonymously and aggregated to understand usage trends and enhance our site.
info_shared_msg: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for commercial purposes.
data_security_msg: We implement security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
third_party_links_msg: Our site may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of these sites before providing any personal information.
privacy_changes_msg: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. All changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to check this policy regularly to stay informed about our privacy practices.
